newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index falls 0.004pts to 101.510.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index falls 0.004pts to 101.510.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds fell 0.004 points in Monday's trading to 101.510, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio rose 0.083 points to 2.509 years.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, fell 0.004 points to 97.693, the bank said, and the duration of the index portfolio rose 0.177 points to 2.381 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 rose 0.417 points to 1,120.656.
